title: Ai/ML Intro By ISRO
description: Completed an online course on AI/ML by ISRO. In this course, I learned about the basics of AI/ML and how it is used in space research and GeoData analysis.

title: DSA in Python
description: Completed the Data Structures and Algorithms in Python course by IIT Madras on the NPTEL platform. This course helped me strengthen my problem-solving skills and understand various data structures and algorithms using Python.

title: Webathon Winner
description: First place in a regional hackathon for building an interactive web application that promotes Education for All.We bagged 1st place at the Webathon – Pravah’25, SKIT Jaipur! I learned a lot about web development and how to work in a team. I also learned about the importance of deadlines and how to manage time effectively.
